title: I Forgive You, So What's That Mouth Doing Later?
itunes:title: I Forgive You, So What's That Mouth Doing Later?
description:
Tuesday 6/26 - It is National Forgiveness Day, the day for you to exhale all the negativity from your mind and body, so we opened up the phone lines for our listeners to get a chance to say who they forgive, and surprisingly a lot had to do with their exes. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Permit Patty the lady that called the cops on an 8 year old. Afterwards it was Shoot Your Shot, and all one listener wanted to know was "what that mouth doing later?". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
